markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 8"
    pfs="Limited"
>
[Elude the Divine](/Feats.aspx?ID=2176) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Legends](/Sources.aspx?ID=40) pg. 101</row>

**Archetype** [Bright Lion](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=129)

**Prerequisites**
[Bright Lion Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=2172)

</column>

---

You are able to escape inquisitions involving divine magic, allowing you to blend in well in Mzali but also to avoid unwanted attention in other oppressive theocracies. You gain the [Slippery Secrets](/Feats.aspx?ID=842) skill feat, and its benefits also apply against [divination](/Traits.aspx?ID=47) effects that attempt to discern your deity. When using Slippery Secrets against a divine divination, you gain a +2 circumstance bonus, and on a critical success, the divination reveals false information appropriate to your false persona, rather than nothing.
name: Elude the Divine

You gain the Slippery Secrets skill feat, and its benefits also apply against divination effects that attempt to discern your deity. When using Slippery Secrets against a divine divination, you gain a +2 circumstance bonus, and on a critical success, the divination reveals false information appropriate to your false persona, rather than nothing.
